description: Warning displayed if an error occurred when saving column settings
Banner displayed when column settings are saved successfully
Header for Column settings page, where users can configure the visibility of columns in folders, collections and lists.
Subtitle for Column settings page, where users can configure the visibility of columns in folders, collections and lists.
defaultMessage: Select all the columns you want to display in all your folders, collections and lists.
Are you sure? Your changes will affect all folders, collections and lists and be visible by all users in your workspace.
